assessment-question.definition: To what extent are the 2017 Decision primary criteria used?

answers.option: Primary criterion used with 2017 code
Primary criterion used with 2010 code
Primary criterion replaced with secondary criterion (with adequate justification)
Primary criterion not used (with adequate justification)
Not clear
Primary criterion not used (with inadequate justification)
Not relevant

assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State use secondary criteria?

answers.option: Secondary criterion used with 2017 code
Secondary criterion used with 2010 code
Not clear
Secondary criteria not used
Not relevant

assessment-question.definition: To what extent is the qualitative GES determination (elements and parameters) adequate?

answers.option: Elements and parameters specified for this criterion
Elements and parameters partially specified for this criterion
Elements and parameters not specified for this criterion
Not clear
Not relevant

assessment-question.definition: To what extent is the qualitative GES determination (objectives) adequate?

answers.option: Clear objectives included in definition of this criterion
Partially clear objectives included in definition of this criterion
Clear objectives not included in definition of this criterion
Not clear
Not relevant

assessment-question.definition: To what extent is there a quantitative determination of GES (threshold values)?

answers.option: Threshold values defined for this criterion
Threshold values partially defined for this criterion
Threshold values not defined for this criterion
Not clear
Not relevant

assessment-question.definition: To what extent is there a quantitative determination of GES (proportion values)?

answers.option: Proportion value set for this criterion is sufficient
Proportion value set for this criterion is partially sufficient
Proportion value set for this criterion is not sufficient
Proportion value set for this criterion is not sufficient
Proportion value not set for this criterion
Not clear
Not relevant

assessment-question.definition: To what extent are levels of ambition defined for GES (GES extent threshold) adequate?

answers.option: Good level of ambition for all elements and features
Good level of ambition for some elements and features (poor or not defined for others)
Poor level of ambition for all elements and features
Level of ambition not defined (GES extent threshold not defined) for all elements and features
Not clear
Not relevant

assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State use the same primary/ secondary criteria as other MS in this region?

answers.option: The MS uses this criterion as most (76%-100%) of the MS in the region
The MS uses this criterion as more than half (51-75%) of MS in the region
The MS uses this criterion as less than half (26-50%) of MS in the region
The MS uses this criterion as only few (1-25%) MS in the region
The MS uses this criterion, but it is not used by any other MS in the region
Not relevant

assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State use GES determinations (elements and parameters) that are similar to other MS in the region?

answers.option: All elements and parameters for this criterion are the same or similar to most MS (76-100%) in the region
All elements and parameters for this criterion are the same or similar to many MS (51-75%) in the region
All elements and parameters for this criterion are the same or similar to some MS (26-50%) in the region
All elements and parameters for this criterion are the same or similar to only a few MS (1-25%) in the region
Some elements and parameters for this criterion are the same or similar to most MS (76-100%) in the region
Some elements and parameters for this criterion are the same or similar to many MS (51-75%) in the region
Some elements and parameters for this criterion are the same or similar to some / few MS (1-50%) in the region
No elements and parameters for this criterion are the same or similar to other MS in the region
Not clear
Not relevant

answers.option: Objectives for this criterion are the same or similar to most MS (76-100%) in the region

Objectives for this criterion are the same or similar to only a few MS (1-25%) in the region
Objectives for this criterion are not the same or similar to other MS in the region
Not clear
Not relevant
